original_text: I have heard the murmurings of the children of Israel: speak unto them, saying, At even ye shall eat flesh, and in the morning ye shall be filled with bread; and ye shall know that I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘 자손의 원망함을 들었노라 그들에게 말하여 이르기를 너희가 해 질 때에는 고기를 먹고 아침에는 떡으로 배부르리니 내가 여호와 너희의 하나님인 줄 알리라 하라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: I have heard the murmurings of the children of Israel
At even ye shall eat flesh
and in the morning ye shall be filled with bread
and ye shall know that I am the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나 여호와 너희 하나님인 줄 알리라
